comments.body: then we will lost test coverage because we don't test hive 0.12 for basic operations...  How about we create a new `HivePartitionFilteringSuite` and move the partition related tests there?

comments.body:
No test coverage has been lost. `HiveClientSuite` is not a good name for that class. It actually just tests partition filtering. I added a `TODO` suggesting we rename it to `HivePartitionFilteringSuite`, but that makes the diff difficult to grok. All other Hive client testing is still in `VersionsSuite`, and that suite still tests all supported Hive versions. I wanted to change the names of these tests to make them clearer, but it resulted in a jumbled diff. You requested that I keep the names as-is to make the diff clearer.

I added "TODO" comments suggesting better names for these classes, for renaming later.
